The most balanced game I have ever played. The Developer's talent is reflected in the type of demographic that loves this game. Generally speaking, the best players have high IQs. I also love the gun market (the skins) bc it being insanely expensive but also actually vehemently investment grade is perverse in the best way. It's quite simply the best FPS all time, bar none
